data.description:
Give that mech a tune-up! Now with refined steering, quest guides, gameplay improvements and new content. Plus! Play matchmaker during the apocalypse and help lonely souls find their merge mate.

In this darkly funny action/adventure game, pilot your mech body through the chaos of a dying metaverse, rescuing abandoned avatars along the way. Each new avatar-roommate brings unique tools to aid your escape back to meatspace!

Do you have what it takes to overcome the digital destruction and interpersonal drama before you’re logged off for good?

• Run, jump and boost your mech across treacherous server-scapes.
• Fly VR headset spaceships to capture other avatars.
• Use your trusty dog-puppet to charm enemies into doing your bidding.
• Vacuum up debris from the metaverse to use as fuel and ammo.
• Slow time with CPGoo to dodge laser attacks.
• Hookshot clouds to ascend toward corporate HQ.
• Achieve self-actualization as an artichoke rhythmically whispers at you.

changelog.change_log: Audio mixing, polish, and bug fixes

-Option to set music levels in the settings
-More fine grained motion reduction options 
-Improved subtitles
-Improved audio mixing, including music and dialogue balance
-“Reduced Mech Motion” does more to limit mech movement
-Additional VO and graphical hints to aid player throughout the game
-Mech does a better job of resetting its state chapter-to-chapter, preventing edge cases that pop up in long playthroughs.
-Fixed edge cases where players could bypass some sequences
-Various stability and bug fixes throughout
-Various graphics and animation improvements.
